testcase.name: Validate Positive LogIn test
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open and launch the url provided...........................passed When user log-in his credentials, username and password.....................passed And user click submit button................................................passed Then user is redirected to new page.........................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Negative username test
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open and launch the url provided...........................passed When user log-in his credentials, incorrect username and correct password...passed And user click submit button................................................passed Then the system displays username error message.............................passed

testcase.name: Validate Negative password test
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open and launch the url provided...........................passed When user log-in his credentials, username and incorrect password...........passed And user click submit button................................................passed Then the system displays password error message.............................passed
